name:
METAL GEAR SOLID SNAKE
EATER 3D Update Ver. 1.1
formal_name:
METAL GEAR SOLID SNAKE
EATER 3D Update Ver. 1.1
description: When save data is created in a specific stage (inside the WIG) with the Circle Pad Pro on, occasionally the game hangs after loading and may corrupt save data. This problem was fixed.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
